events.message: We have received an application from Jane Doe for the software engineer position in our backend team. The resume shows strong experience in Java and cloud services.
Jane Doe's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and cloud development experience.
Recruiter Michael Smith has been assigned to handle the application of Jane Doe and will coordinate next steps including interviews.
Completed the initial screening call with Jane. She demonstrated good communication skills and a solid understanding of our tech stack requirements.
Jane has responded positively to our invitation for a technical interview and is available next week for scheduling.
The technical interview with Jane Doe has been scheduled for May 7th at 14:00 UTC with our senior developer panel.
